error-summary-service-fail: Sorry, there was a problem with the service

nino.nino: Enter a National Insurance number in the correct format
nino.nino-format: Enter a National Insurance number in the correct format

address.house-number: Enter your house name or number

text-message.missing: Select Yes if you would like to receive a text message
text-message.mobile: Enter a mobile number, like 07700 900 982 or +44 7700 900 982
text-message.format: Enter a mobile number, like 07700 900 982 or +44 7700 900 982

esa.missing: Select yes if you have applied for or get New Style Employment and Support Allowance (ESA)

fitnote-needed.missing: You must choose an option to continue

feedback.maxlength: Enter improvement suggestions using 1200 characters or less
feedback.name: Enter a shorter name (maximum 1000 characters)

validFileType: Accepted file types are JPG, JPEG, HEIC, HEIF, BMP, PNG, TIF or PDF
invalidFileType: We cannot process the type of file you selected. You will need to make another copy of your fit note in one of these file types: JPG, JPEG, BMP, PNG, TIF, HEIC, HEIF or PDF.

method-obtained.missing: Select how you got your fit note

upload.fileType: The selected file must be a JPG, JPEG, HEIC, HEIF, BMP, PNG, TIF or PDF
